title: Mobile - iOS - MLB - Individual Person
custom_preconds: GIVEN user provides a valid PersonID in the form http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people/{PersonId}
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people/594798 with no parameters
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract

title: Mobile - iOS - MLB - Person Pitching Stats for Season with Hydrates
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people?personIds=594798&season=2020&hydrate=stats(group=[pitching],type=[season],season=2020) with the PersonIds, Season, and Hydrate parameters
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract

title: Mobile - iOS - MLB - Person Hitting Stats for Season with Hydrates
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people?personIds=594798&season=2020&hydrate=stats(group=[hitting],type=[season],season=2019) with the PersonIds, Season, and Hydrate parameters
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract

title: Mobile - iOS - MLB - Individual Person Game Stats
custom_preconds: GIVEN user provides a valid PersonID and GamePK in the form http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people/{PersonId}/stats/game/{GamePk}
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to http://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1/people/594798/stats/game/631216 without any parameters
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract

title: Mobile - iOS - MLB - Game Live Feed
custom_preconds: GIVEN user provides a valid GamePk in the form https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1.1/game/{GamePk}/feed/live
custom_steps: WHEN user executes a GET request to https://statsapi.mlb.com/api/v1.1/game/631216/feed/live
custom_expected: THEN the returned JSON object adheres to the Pact.IO consumer contract
